sentences.sContent: Drinks and light snacks are served at the bar.
sentences.sCn: 酒吧里供应饮料和小吃。

sentences.sContent: snack foods like crisps and peanuts
sentences.sCn: 炸薯片和花生之类的小吃

sentences.sContent: Lunch was a snack in the fields.
sentences.sCn: 午饭是在野外吃的快餐。

remMethod.val: 缺少(lack)主食， 就吃点儿点心(snack)

trans.tranOther: a small amount of food that is eaten between main meals or instead of a meal
